_README._comment1: DO NOT TRANSLATE KEYS STARTING WITH _
_README._comment2: Always keep the '{{...}}text{{..}}' as one unit in translation strings. Also do not translate the text inside the double curly brackets '{{…}}'.  These beginning and ending {{...}} make the enclosed 'text' a hyper link
_README._comment3: DO NOT TRANSLATE <RoomName>. It is a placeholder for the name of the room.

activation.webportalWelcomeSubtitleWebexShare: Welcome! Let's get your Webex Share set up.
activation.webportalWelcomeSubtitleWebexVoice: Welcome! Let's get your Webex Voice set up.
activation.nextStepOptionExplanation: Ethernet Network is detected. Enter your activation code to activate the device.
activation.nextStepOptionExplanation1: You can add/generate certificates by clicking on Add Certificate (optional).

activationNetworkErrorMessageObj.finalText: Could not activate due to poor network connection. Please try again, {{activation/activationNetworkErrorMessageObj/_anchor1StartTag}}configure proxy{{common/_anchorCloseTag}} or {{activation/activationNetworkErrorMessageObj/_anchor2StartTag}}join other Wi-Fi network.{{common/_anchorCloseTag}}

activationStatus.finalText: You can view {{activation/activationStatus/_anchor1StartTag}} Status Messages {{common/_anchorCloseTag}} of this device

activation.activationGDSErrorMessage: Failed to register due to Webex GDS error.
activation.activationInternalServerErrorMessage: Failed to register due to 500 Internal server error, please try again.
activation.activationInternalError: Could not activate due to internal error. Please try again with your activation code or contact your system administrator.
activation.activationBadCodeError: Could not activate due to invalid code. Please try again with a new activation code or contact your system administrator.
activation.activationTokenInvalidError: Failed to register due to invalid token error. Please try again with a new activation code.
activation.registrationNetworkErrorMessage: Device is activated but failed to register because of a networking issue. Please try again or contact your system administrator.

registrationFailureMessageObj.finalText: Failed to register. Please try again, {{activation/registrationFailureMessageObj/_anchor1StartTag}}configure proxy{{common/_anchorCloseTag}} or {{activation/registrationFailureMessageObj/_anchor2StartTag}} join other Wi-Fi network.{{common/_anchorCloseTag}}

activation.successMessage: Set up done! <RoomName> is ready to use.
activation.labelEnterCodeLongPrompt: Enter your 16 digit Webex activation code or get a code from admin.ciscospark.com

network.labelConnectWiFiNetworkWebexShare: Connect Webex Share to your Wi-Fi network
network.labelConnectWiFiNetworkWebexVoice: Connect Webex Voice to your Wi-Fi network

calibration.calibrateLongPrompt: Adjust the overscan or display settings of your television until four circles are visible.

geolocation.timeSyncErrorMessage: Cannot sync time with network. Local time will be used in the system. Time will be synced once network is connected.

problemReportStatusPageUsageDescriptionO.finalText: View the status of pending and completed problem reports here. Click each one to view a list of the events that have occurred and view errors if they have been encountered. Follow this {{support/problemReportStatusPageUsageDescriptionObj/_anchorStartTag}}link{{common/_anchorCloseTag}} to open a TAC case.
